g.text: on the service host by consul/ansible
* consistency (all cache clients have same list)
* security (deployed in trusted env; values maybe
encrypted on write, decrypted on read)
(no domino effect => use virtual servers on the ring)
ring as well to get first
redis-sentinel uses this setup, and can
promote read replica to be leader
1. client knows routing info (with help of coordination service)
2. use dedicated routing tier host / routing service (middleman)
3. cache instances know about each other, request sent to random cache server and forwarded to appropriate one for query key
(potential extra network hop from selected cache server to the server that is responsible for the key)
replicas can be in different data centers
